About Work Blog Contact

Brenna is a web developer in Toronto.

I specialize in front-end dev, love a good challenge, and sometimes dip my toes into the waters of desgin. Responsive design and modular CSS are my close companions.

I also contribute my code and my <3 to Women && Tech and mentor with Ladies Learning Code.
